Articles.Content: I have some questions with autodesk inventor and 3ds mad. I have both and i know that you can make models with 3ds max but can you make it with inventor? i\'m much better with inventor, and was just wondering. Also, how do i make a .DAE file in 3ds max? Thanks
I tried and failed with a dae exporter with Max. Instead I use an obj exporter that works just fine. I can find it for you when I get home later if you want.
